question: Which is the world’s biggest energy firm, in terms of market capitalization, as on July 2020?
explanation:
The Saudi Arabian Oil Company otherwise called as Saudi Aramco is a multinational petroleum and natural gas company. It is the world’s biggest energy firm, with USD 1.75 trillion market capitalization.
Recently, the Reliance Industries surpassed Exxon Mobil Corp. to become the world’s second largest energy company.  Reliance has the world’s biggest oil refinery complex. Its market value is USD 189 billion, as on July 27, 2020.
